review_title: I liked my team but not company

review_title: Safety Net Provider - help take care of the needy.
job_title: Patient Care Coordinator in Chinatown, HI
pros: Working shoulder to shoulder with colleagues that really want to help the community.
cons: The work is demanding. The pay is could definitely be better. I know that the management staff has given us better hourly rates than when I first started but it is definitely not enough to live in Los Angeles.

job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Los Angeles, CA
pros: 10 min walk from Chinatown Metro Gold Line station, reimbursement from public transportation, good health insurance benefit, paid time off accumulation for sick and vacation
cons: No severance pay for most, wearing multiple hats and handle high volume of patients in a fast-paced environment, non paid lunch time, no overtime unless approved (rarely), low pay. High expectation from the management team. Less and less non-profit environment.

job_title: Academic Tutor in Los Angeles, CA
pros: I like that they are flexible
cons: Unprofessional management; hires anyone which is not helpful for the company

job_title: Nurse Practitioner in Los Angeles, CA
cons: Unorganized, low pay, no work life balance, a lot of patient demands but lack of teamwork to fulfill demands.
